contacts.Name: Welt
contacts.SignatureText: Everyone on the Express, please constantly keep in touch

messages.MainText: The initial results are back. This entity born out of space distortions is called a Calyx

Such entities may contain reality data that has practical value. Exercise extreme caution when you come into contact with it. The very nature of spatial distortion is inexplicable chaos, and it's quite difficult to tell if there are any elements of danger hidden within

contacts.Name: Dan Heng
contacts.SignatureText: For anything related to the data bank, come find me.

messages.MainText: Hi. This is Dan Heng.
Remember to go find Himeko.
Hey there, this is March :D
Himeko wants to talk to you about something. Don't forget~

contacts.Name: Herta
contacts.SignatureText: This account is disabled | Business Contact: Asta

messages.MainText: Hey, {NICKNAME}, it's Herta. I need you for something good
Come to my office quickly! I'm waiting!
But you're right next to me
messages.OptionText: But you're right next to me

messages.MainText: Can't you just tell me
[Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later
Hey, um, it's me... I got your number without asking
Are you still at the space station?
Of course, we haven't said farewell yet
messages.OptionText: Of course, we haven't said farewell yet

messages.MainText: I'm already on the Express to travel among the stars
messages.OptionText: I'm already on the Express to travel among the stars

messages.MainText: That depends on what it is that you need my help with...
The station is launching a program called "Project Revival." If you have time, I'd like to ask for some help
Not for free, of course! A very sizable sum has already been prepared. As long as you come on board, you can get paid as much as I can afford!
Uh oh, my phone's credits for this month are running out... This is the last message. Come! I'll be waiting.
??? Didn't you say there was a sizable sum?
messages.OptionText: ??? Didn't you say there was a sizable sum?

contacts.Name: Asta
contacts.SignatureText: I shouldn't buy any more stuff...

messages.MainText: Has anyone seen the elderly Wen Tianweng?
Maybe he was captured by monsters of the Legion?
Trust me, Arlan, no one would want to kidnap a grumpy old man. {NICKNAME}, have you seen him?
So there are actual old people on the space station?
messages.OptionText: So there are actual old people on the space station?

messages.MainText: It is possible that someone might want to kidnap a grumpy old man...
messages.OptionText: It is possible that someone might want to kidnap a grumpy old man...

messages.MainText: In any case, it'd be greatly appreciated if you could keep us posted. The old man might have gone traveling among the stars with friends from his younger days.
Let us know if you ever run into him
The recipient cannot currently receive messages
